p: In the mesic grassland soil moisture was highest in the control plots (ANOVA: Chi 2 = 51.31, p < 0.001), while the opposite occurred in the semi-arid savannah (Chi 2 = 23.03, p < 0.001, Fig. 6, Table 1, Supplementary Table S.7). In the arid scrubland there were no significant differences in soil moisture between the different microsites (Chi 2 = 4.34, p > 0.05, Fig. 6, Table 1, Supplementary Table S.7).
